sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE160403 ( SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_YYMM , DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , TAXM_SA01_BI , TAXM_SB01_BI , TAXM_SC01_BI , TAXM_SD01_BI , TAXM_SE01_BI , TAXM_SE02_BI , TAXM_SE10_BI , TAXM_SF01_BI , TAXM_SG01_BI , TAXM_SH01_BI , TAXM_SH02_BI , TAXM_SH03_BI , TAXM_SH04_BI , TAXM_SH05_BI , TAXM_SH06_BI , TAXM_SH07_BI , TAXM_SH08_BI , TAXM_SH09_BI , TAXM_SH10_BI , TAXM_SH14_BI , TAXM_SH15_BI , TAXM_SH11_BI , TAXM_SH12_BI , TAXM_SH13_BI , TAXM_SH16_BI , TAXM_SI01_BI , TAXM_SJ01_BI , TAXM_SJ10_BI , TAXM_SK01_BI , TAXM_SL01_BI , TAXM_SM01_BI , TAXM_SM02_BI , TAXM_SM03_BI , TAXM_SN01_BI , TAXM_SO01_BI , TAXM_SP01_BI , TAXM_SP02_BI , TAXM_SQ01_BI , TAXM_SR01_BI , TAXM_SR10_BI , TAXM_SS01_BI , TAXM_SY02_BI , TAXM_SY03_BI , TAXM_SY04_BI , TAXM_SY21_BI , TAXM_SY22_BI , TAXM_ST01_BI , TAXM_ST10_BI , TAXM_ST11_BI , TAXM_ST12_BI , TAXM_ST20_BI , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) ( SELECT #systemkey# , AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH , #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , (0) AS TAXM_SA01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SB01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SC01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SD01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SE01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SE02_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SE10_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SF01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SG01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH02_BI , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(A01.PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM) FROM PYYT0302 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND A01.PYYT_YR_MNTH = AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND A01.PYYT_ITEM_CD IN ('C9100200') ),0) AS TAXM_SH03_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH04_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH05_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH06_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH07_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH08_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH09_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH10_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH14_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH15_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH11_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH12_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH13_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SH16_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SI01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SJ01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SJ10_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SK01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SL01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SM01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SM02_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SM03_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SN01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SO01_BI , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(A01.PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM) FROM PYYT0302 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND A01.PYYT_YR_MNTH = AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND A01.PYYT_ITEM_CD IN ('C9080100') ),0) AS TAXM_SP01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SP02_BI , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(A01.PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM) FROM PYYT0302 A01 WHERE A01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND A01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND A01.PYYT_YR_MNTH = AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND A01.PYYT_ITEM_CD IN ('C9050100') ),0) AS TAXM_SQ01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SR01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SR10_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SS01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SY02_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SY03_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SY04_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SY21_BI , (0) AS TAXM_SY22_BI , (0) AS TAXM_ST01_BI , (0) AS TAXM_ST10_BI , (0) AS TAXM_ST11_BI , (0) AS TAXM_ST12_BI , (0) AS TAXM_ST20_BI , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #revnAddr# FROM ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY , DPOB_CD , PYYT_YR_MNTH , SUM(PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM) , SUM(PYYT_PYDD_TXTN_AMNT) , SUM(PYYT_PYDD_FREE_DTY_SUM) FROM PYYT0302 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SUBSTR(PYYT_YR_MNTH,1,4) = #yrtxBlggYr# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# GROUP BY SYSTEMKEY , DPOB_CD , PYYT_YR_MNTH ORDER BY PYYT_YR_MNTH ) AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SUBSTR(AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH,1,4) = #yrtxBlggYr# )

INSERT INTO YE160403 ( SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_YYMM , DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , TAXM_SA01_BI , TAXM_SB01_BI , TAXM_SC01_BI , TAXM_SD01_BI , TAXM_SE01_BI , TAXM_SE02_BI , TAXM_SE10_BI , TAXM_SF01_BI , TAXM_SG01_BI , TAXM_SH01_BI , TAXM_SH02_BI , TAXM_SH03_BI , TAXM_SH04_BI , TAXM_SH05_BI , TAXM_SH06_BI , TAXM_SH07_BI , TAXM_SH08_BI , TAXM_SH09_BI , TAXM_SH10_BI , TAXM_SH14_BI , TAXM_SH15_BI , TAXM_SH11_BI , TAXM_SH12_BI , TAXM_SH13_BI , TAXM_SH16_BI , TAXM_SI01_BI , TAXM_SJ01_BI , TAXM_SJ10_BI , TAXM_SK01_BI , TAXM_SL01_BI , TAXM_SM01_BI , TAXM_SM02_BI , TAXM_SM03_BI , TAXM_SN01_BI , TAXM_SO01_BI , TAXM_SP01_BI , TAXM_SP02_BI , TAXM_SQ01_BI , TAXM_SR01_BI , TAXM_SR10_BI , TAXM_SS01_BI , TAXM_SY02_BI , TAXM_SY03_BI , TAXM_SY04_BI , TAXM_SY21_BI , TAXM_SY22_BI , TAXM_ST01_BI , TAXM_ST10_BI , TAXM_ST11_BI , TAXM_ST12_BI , TAXM_ST20_BI , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #systemkey# , #elctYymm# , #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #taxmSa01Bi# , #taxmSb01Bi# , #taxmSc01Bi# , #taxmSd01Bi# , #taxmSe01Bi# , #taxmSe02Bi# , #taxmSe10Bi# , #taxmSf01Bi# , #taxmSg01Bi# , #taxmSh01Bi# , #taxmSh02Bi# , #taxmSh03Bi# , #taxmSh04Bi# , #taxmSh05Bi# , #taxmSh06Bi# , #taxmSh07Bi# , #taxmSh08Bi# , #taxmSh09Bi# , #taxmSh10Bi# , #taxmSh14Bi# , #taxmSh15Bi# , #taxmSh11Bi# , #taxmSh12Bi# , #taxmSh13Bi# , #taxmSh16Bi# , #taxmSi01Bi# , #taxmSj01Bi# , #taxmSj10Bi# , #taxmSk01Bi# , #taxmSl01Bi# , #taxmSm01Bi# , #taxmSm02Bi# , #taxmSm03Bi# , #taxmSn01Bi# , #taxmSo01Bi# , #taxmSp01Bi# , #taxmSp02Bi# , #taxmSq01Bi# , #taxmSr01Bi# , #taxmSr10Bi# , #taxmSs01Bi# , #taxmSy02Bi# , #taxmSy03Bi# , #taxmSy04Bi# , #taxmSy21Bi# , #taxmSy22Bi# , #taxmSt01Bi# , #taxmSt10Bi# , #taxmSt11Bi# , #taxmSt12Bi# , #taxmSt20Bi# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE160403 SET SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , TAXM_SA01_BI=#taxmSa01Bi# , TAXM_SB01_BI=#taxmSb01Bi# , TAXM_SC01_BI=#taxmSc01Bi# , TAXM_SD01_BI=#taxmSd01Bi# , TAXM_SE01_BI=#taxmSe01Bi# , TAXM_SE02_BI=#taxmSe02Bi# , TAXM_SE10_BI=#taxmSe10Bi# , TAXM_SF01_BI=#taxmSf01Bi# , TAXM_SG01_BI=#taxmSg01Bi# , TAXM_SH01_BI=#taxmSh01Bi# , TAXM_SH02_BI=#taxmSh02Bi# , TAXM_SH03_BI=#taxmSh03Bi# , TAXM_SH04_BI=#taxmSh04Bi# , TAXM_SH05_BI=#taxmSh05Bi# , TAXM_SH06_BI=#taxmSh06Bi# , TAXM_SH07_BI=#taxmSh07Bi# , TAXM_SH08_BI=#taxmSh08Bi# , TAXM_SH09_BI=#taxmSh09Bi# , TAXM_SH10_BI=#taxmSh10Bi# , TAXM_SH14_BI=#taxmSh14Bi# , TAXM_SH15_BI=#taxmSh15Bi# , TAXM_SH11_BI=#taxmSh11Bi# , TAXM_SH12_BI=#taxmSh12Bi# , TAXM_SH13_BI=#taxmSh13Bi# , TAXM_SH16_BI=#taxmSh16Bi# , TAXM_SI01_BI=#taxmSi01Bi# , TAXM_SJ01_BI=#taxmSj01Bi# , TAXM_SJ10_BI=#taxmSj10Bi# , TAXM_SK01_BI=#taxmSk01Bi# , TAXM_SL01_BI=#taxmSl01Bi# , TAXM_SM01_BI=#taxmSm01Bi# , TAXM_SM02_BI=#taxmSm02Bi# , TAXM_SM03_BI=#taxmSm03Bi# , TAXM_SN01_BI=#taxmSn01Bi# , TAXM_SO01_BI=#taxmSo01Bi# , TAXM_SP01_BI=#taxmSp01Bi# , TAXM_SP02_BI=#taxmSp02Bi# , TAXM_SQ01_BI=#taxmSq01Bi# , TAXM_SR01_BI=#taxmSr01Bi# , TAXM_SR10_BI=#taxmSr10Bi# , TAXM_SS01_BI=#taxmSs01Bi# , TAXM_SY02_BI=#taxmSy02Bi# , TAXM_SY03_BI=#taxmSy03Bi# , TAXM_SY04_BI=#taxmSy04Bi# , TAXM_SY21_BI=#taxmSy21Bi# , TAXM_SY22_BI=#taxmSy22Bi# , TAXM_ST01_BI=#taxmSt01Bi# , TAXM_ST10_BI=#taxmSt10Bi# , TAXM_ST11_BI=#taxmSt11Bi# , TAXM_ST12_BI=#taxmSt12Bi# , TAXM_ST20_BI=#taxmSt20Bi# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE160403 WHERE SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
DELETE FROM YE160403 WHERE SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_YYMM , DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , TAXM_SA01_BI , TAXM_SB01_BI , TAXM_SC01_BI , TAXM_SD01_BI , TAXM_SE01_BI , TAXM_SE02_BI , TAXM_SE10_BI , TAXM_SF01_BI , TAXM_SG01_BI , TAXM_SH01_BI , TAXM_SH02_BI , TAXM_SH03_BI , TAXM_SH04_BI , TAXM_SH05_BI , TAXM_SH06_BI , TAXM_SH07_BI , TAXM_SH08_BI , TAXM_SH09_BI , TAXM_SH10_BI , TAXM_SH14_BI , TAXM_SH15_BI , TAXM_SH11_BI , TAXM_SH12_BI , TAXM_SH13_BI , TAXM_SH16_BI , TAXM_SI01_BI , TAXM_SJ01_BI , TAXM_SJ10_BI , TAXM_SK01_BI , TAXM_SL01_BI , TAXM_SM01_BI , TAXM_SM02_BI , TAXM_SM03_BI , TAXM_SN01_BI , TAXM_SO01_BI , TAXM_SP01_BI , TAXM_SP02_BI , TAXM_SQ01_BI , TAXM_SR01_BI , TAXM_SR10_BI , TAXM_SS01_BI , TAXM_SY02_BI , TAXM_SY03_BI , TAXM_SY04_BI , TAXM_SY21_BI , TAXM_SY22_BI , TAXM_ST01_BI , TAXM_ST10_BI , TAXM_ST11_BI , TAXM_ST12_BI , TAXM_ST20_BI , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE160403 WHERE SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_YYMM , DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , TAXM_SA01_BI , TAXM_SB01_BI , TAXM_SC01_BI , TAXM_SD01_BI , TAXM_SE01_BI , TAXM_SE02_BI , TAXM_SE10_BI , TAXM_SF01_BI , TAXM_SG01_BI , TAXM_SH01_BI , TAXM_SH02_BI , TAXM_SH03_BI , TAXM_SH04_BI , TAXM_SH05_BI , TAXM_SH06_BI , TAXM_SH07_BI , TAXM_SH08_BI , TAXM_SH09_BI , TAXM_SH10_BI , TAXM_SH14_BI , TAXM_SH15_BI , TAXM_SH11_BI , TAXM_SH12_BI , TAXM_SH13_BI , TAXM_SH16_BI , TAXM_SI01_BI , TAXM_SJ01_BI , TAXM_SJ10_BI , TAXM_SK01_BI , TAXM_SL01_BI , TAXM_SM01_BI , TAXM_SM02_BI , TAXM_SM03_BI , TAXM_SN01_BI , TAXM_SO01_BI , TAXM_SP01_BI , TAXM_SP02_BI , TAXM_SQ01_BI , TAXM_SR01_BI , TAXM_SR10_BI , TAXM_SS01_BI , TAXM_SY02_BI , TAXM_SY03_BI , TAXM_SY04_BI , TAXM_SY21_BI , TAXM_SY22_BI , TAXM_ST01_BI , TAXM_ST10_BI , TAXM_ST11_BI , TAXM_ST12_BI , TAXM_ST20_BI , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE160403 WHERE 1=1
SYSTEMKEY = #searchKeyword#
ELCT_YYMM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY SYSTEMKEY DESC , ELCT_YYMM DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE160403 WHERE 1=1
SYSTEMKEY = #searchKeyword#
ELCT_YYMM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
